name: Sufficient
description:
I spent 2 days procrastinating on what I should make for the GameJam and I've decided to make you suffer. 

You'll experience a short story with a lot of suffering if you're unfortunate, but do not fear because a fellow trash gamer is here. I've added a cheat mode for those who are terrible at the game like I am.

Please keep in mind that this took only a few hours to create and that I'm not an experienced Game Developer.

Enjoy your pain.
